title: MAGIX Photostory Deluxe - Version 2019 - Create Slideshows the Easy Way
description: Lights, Camera, action - all for your photos! with photo story Deluxe, you can quickly and easily create versatile slideshows to showcase treasured Memories and share them with family and friends. Following requests from our customers, we've completely redesigned photo story. The program Now features improved operation, a new effects area with a huge range of effects and even more Camera pans and zoom a wide range of background music is available to create the perfect atmosphere. The new version also features a powerful engine, which enables users to combine breathtaking effects with high-resolution photos. The software also includes features for image editing and stabilization. Faster. Easier. More impressive. Slideshows created with the new photo story Deluxe.
